name: Succubus Princess Reina
text: You can Ritual Summon this card with *Ritual of the Scarlet Throne*. You can banish 2 *Succubus* monsters from your Graveyard; Special Summon this card (from your Graveyard)./nThis card gains 300 ATK for each *Succubus* monster in your Graveyard./nIf this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; take control of it. You can only activate this effect of *Succubus Princess Reina* once per turn.
